description:
Traited class [tvb.simulator.models.epileptorcodim3.EpileptorCodim3]

[Saggioetal_2017]Saggio ML, Spiegler A, Bernard C, Jirsa VK.

Fast–Slow Bursters in the Unfolding of a High Codimension Singularity and the Ultra-slow Transitions of Classes. Journal of Mathematical Neuroscience. 2017;7:7. doi:10.1186/s13408-017-0050-8.

subsystems acting at different timescales. For the fast subsystem we use the unfolding of a degenerate Takens-Bogdanov bifucation of codimension 3. The slow subsystem steers the fast one back and forth along paths leading to bursting behavior. The model is able to produce almost all the classes of bursting predicted for systems with a planar fast subsystem.

of classes c0, c0', c2s, c3s, c4s, c10s, c11s, c2b, c4b, c8b, c14b and c16b as classified by [Saggioetal_2017] Table 2. The default model parameters correspond to class c2s.

Attributes declared

arguments.mu1_start: The bifurcation parameter mu1 at the offset point for the given class, default for class c2s (Saddle-Node at onset and Saddle-Homoclinic at offset)
arguments.mu2_start: The bifurcation mu2 parameter at the offset point for the given class, default for class c2s (Saddle-Node at onset and Saddle-Homoclinic at offset)
arguments.nu_start: The bifurcation nu parameter at the offset point for the given class, default for class c2s (Saddle-Node at onset and Saddle-Homoclinic at offset)
arguments.mu1_stop: The bifurcation mu1 parameter at the onset point for the given class, default for class c2s (Saddle-Node at onset and Saddle-Homoclinic at offset)
arguments.mu2_stop: The bifurcation mu2 parameter at the onset point for the given class, default for class c2s (Saddle-Node at onset and Saddle-Homoclinic at offset)
arguments.nu_stop: The bifurcation nu parameter at the onset point for the given class, default for class c2s (Saddle-Node at onset and Saddle-Homoclinic at offset)
arguments.b: Unfolding type of the degenerate Takens-Bogdanov bifurcation, default is a focus type
arguments.dstar: Threshold for the inversion of the slow variable
arguments.Ks: Slow permittivity coupling strength, the default is no coupling
arguments.N: The branch of the resting state, default is 1
arguments.modification: When modification is True, then use the modification to stabilise the system for negative values of dstar. If modification is False, then don't use the modification. The default value is True
